thread.title: Ex-student kills 17 in shooting spree at Florida high school

title: Ex-student kills 17 in shooting spree at Florida high school
text:
Ex-student kills 17 in shooting spree at Florida high school 2:57pm IST - 01:28 
A 19-year-old gunman opened fire on Wednesday at a Florida high school he had previously been expelled from, killing 17 people before he was arrested by police, according to Broward County Sheriff Scott Israel. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A 19-year-old gunman opened fire on Wednesday at a Florida high school he had previously been expelled from, killing 17 people before he was arrested by police, according to Broward County Sheriff Scott Israel.
